rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0001
rows.name: Incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0002
rows.name:
It's thanks to becoming a
Driver that I could come
to a place like this!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0003
rows.name:
Blades and Drivers are
truly incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0004
rows.name: Oh yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0005
rows.name: Boss, Nia, I need some advice.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0006
rows.name: You want our advice on something?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0007
rows.name: Tora is really worried about something.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0008
rows.name:
Actually... Tora has
realized something.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0009
rows.name: Tora is...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0010
rows.name: Tora is...?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0011
rows.name:
Actually, I'm not being
very useful in battle.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0014
rows.name: What's wrong, both of you?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0015
rows.name: Ah, no... I was just a bit surprised.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0016
rows.name:
I never thought you'd be
questioning yourself like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0017
rows.name: That's mean?!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0018
rows.name:
I think you're doing
fine in battles, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0019
rows.name: ...That's all thanks to Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0020
rows.name:
She passes and receives weapons,
making it possible for Tora to
fight like a real Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0021
rows.name:
So in truth, if that program was removed
and Hana fought alone without Tora, it
would be most efficient and approach.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0022
rows.name: Wow, Hana must be really something.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0023
rows.name: So Tora is basically just a burden.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0024
rows.name:
No, Tora... That's not
something to be proud of.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0025
rows.name:
That's why Tora is wondering if
he should keep being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0026
rows.name:
I sometimes think it might be
better to retire and just manage
Hana from the sidelines.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0027
rows.name: Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0028
rows.name: What do you think, Nia?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0029
rows.name: What shall I ask Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0030
rows.name: What made you want to become a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0031
rows.name:
What you think is
important for a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0101
rows.name: To be honest, I'm not sure anymore.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0102
rows.name:
Creating an artificial Blade
has been our family's dream
since my grandfather's time.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0103
rows.name:
So naturally Tora also thought
that was what he should do.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0104
rows.name:
So why do you think your grandfather
wanted to create an artificial
Blade in the first place?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0105
rows.name: That was probably...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0106
rows.name: He want to be famous!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0107
rows.name: That's a pretty shallow reason.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0108
rows.name: Nopon Drivers are really rare.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0109
rows.name:
If you become a Driver, you'll
definitely be super famous.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0110
rows.name:
So is that your motivation
as well, Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0111
rows.name:
Momomo, I think it's
not quite the same.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0112
rows.name: Tora wants to become like you, Boss.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0113
rows.name: Like me?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0114
rows.name:
Initially, Tora was just attracted
to the idea of being a Driver without
really thinking about why.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0115
rows.name:
But after traveling with Boss and
everyone, Tora's thinking changed.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0116
rows.name:
Helping those in need, facing
all kinds of challenges...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0117
rows.name: Boss is truly Tora's ideal Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0118
rows.name:
It's kind of embarrassing
to be told that directly.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0119
rows.name:
I get it. It's a bit dubious, but at
least you have a clear objective.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0120
rows.name: What do you mean by 'dubious'...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0121
rows.name:
In that case, you're all set!
Tora should keep being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0122
rows.name:
As long as you have something
you want to accomplish, you
should continue as a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0123
rows.name:
That's what Blades are for. To
help you achieve your goals.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0124
rows.name:
Hana shouldn't be fighting
all by herself. You need to
fight alongside her, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0125
rows.name: You're definitely right.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0126
rows.name: Thank you, Boss and Nia!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0127
rows.name:
Tora will work harder
than ever as a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0201
rows.name: I've given that a lot of thought...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0202
rows.name: Love for your Blade is important.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0203
rows.name: ...L-love?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0204
rows.name: That's an unexpected answer...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0205
rows.name:
Tora has been observing
and analyzing...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0206
rows.name:
And Tora understood that all Drivers
have love for their Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0207
rows.name:
Boss loves Homura, and
Nia loves Byakko!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0208
rows.name: I love Homura?!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0209
rows.name: R-Rex and Homura...?!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0210
rows.name:
When it comes to love for Hana,
Tora won't be outdone by anyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0211
rows.name:
But I don't think love alone
justifies being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0212
rows.name: That may be true, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0213
rows.name: Wait, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0214
rows.name:
This discussion is getting
messy. Wouldn't it be faster
to just ask Hana directly?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0215
rows.name: You're right... Let's call Hana here.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0216
rows.name:
Hana... What would you do
if Tora said he wanted to
quit being a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0217
rows.name: I'd be very upset if he quit.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0218
rows.name:
Mo-mo-mo! Tora will do
his best as a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0220
rows.name: Well, that was resolved quickly...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0221
rows.name:
Y-yeah, that's a relief...
ehh... (Rex and Homura...)
